name: Pit Fiend
description: The Pit Fiend has red, scaly skin, massive bat-like wings, and flaming eyes, adorned with infernal armor. It wields flaming swords or massive maces, and its body is marked with scars.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear and its powerful spellcasting make the Pit Fiend a truly formidable foe.
goals: Commanding legions of devils and spreading destruction.
relations: Often found serving other powerful devils or leading infernal armies.
environment: Typically found in the Nine Hells or in the presence of dark magic.
strengths: High strength and charisma scores enhance its combat and intimidations.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to effects that exploit its lower dexterity.
attacks: Can deliver devastating bite, mace, and tail attacks, inflicting significant damage and additional effects such as poison.
most_powerful_ability: The Fear Aura that frightens creatures nearby, making it a psychological threat.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see invisible creatures.
skills: Skilled in athletics, insight, and has high perception, indicating exceptional awareness.
additional_information: Aura of the Devil Lord enhances allies and frightens enemies.
Damage immunities to fire and poison grant durability.
Magic Resistance provides advantages against spells and magical effects.
Innate spellcasting allows for versatile tactical options.
Multiattack capability enables it to strike multiple times.
spellcasting: Can cast fireball and other spells at will, with significant control options.
